data.what_is:
Propellor is a cross-channel data platform that works in real time, syncs all your marketing, sales, and customer data from over 200 sources and builds a single source of intelligence. 

Propellor is an entirely new way to do analytics on your data. It gives you instant access to data when you need it. Propellor helps you find the correct data intuitively and generate timely analysis to get your job done. Say goodbye to chart junk and cumbersome spreadsheets. 

With drag-and-drop data analytics, anyone can quickly glean insights -- no coding required. Propellor is taking analytics out of the hands of data scientists, democratizing it across your entire company, and freeing up time for employees to do strategic work.
data.product_description:
Born in 2016, we are firmly rooted in the problem-solving principle 'Occam's Razor'; otherwise known as the Law of Parsimony.

Plainly put, Occam's Razor states that "The simplest solution is usually the one that requires making the least assumptions"

We believe more technology is not necessarily the best answer to business questions.

Instead, high performance oriented organizations invest in a system to arrive at simple, effective solutions, faster. What it takes is to get various tech components to talk to one another, continuous iteration and lastly, measure performance on a selected few metrics.

Propellor saves upto 70% time of users by automating the entire data preparation cycle. 

Get your Data in Shape
Fully automated data integration from any kind of a data source into a universal schema

Work on all the intelligence
Use self-serve analytics to understand what happens, why, and how to improve your product

Decisions on the go
Align on decisions and integrate with your existing workflows and tech stack

Execute Easily
Whatever is your campaign objective you plan and execute in few clicks

Segment & personalize
Segment your customer base and personalize your offering according to their tastes and preferences

Retain users and revenue
Simulate your retention campaigns and get the best value out of your users

Our mission is to cut through the Tech clutter and put Data Science to work, for high performance startups & Fortune 500 alike.

initial_reviews.review_title: Propellor Makes It Easy to unify all Ecommerce Data"
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Propellor?
Propellor has many pre-built templates and apps that help business users like me get a jumpstart. My team benefits from the rich insights that would have taken us days to get to. We save almost 3 hours every day per team member by leveraging pre-built dashboards in Propellor.

What do you dislike about Propellor?
I would like to have ERP connectors inside Propellor. Currently they support SAP.
Recommendations to others considering the product:
Go for an annual subscription as the product gives you a reliable single source of truth.

What problems is Propellor solving and how is that benefiting you?
Propellor has been an excellent platform for business insights.
It helps us better understand our consumer data and extract insights we use to segment our consumer base and personalize campaigns. Their customer success team has been beneficial and responsive. Their team has helped us build custom dashboards to dig deeper into product purchase journeys and LTV. Today they are an integral part of our growth & retention channels. Highly recommend it!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Propellor solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Propellor has been an excellent platform for business insights.
It helps us better understand our consumer data and extract insights we use to segment our consumer base and personalize campaigns. Their customer success team has been beneficial and responsive. Their team has helped us build custom dashboards to dig deeper into product purchase journeys and LTV. Today they are an integral part of our growth & retention channels. Highly recommend it!

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Propellor?
The best part about this tool is that it has a user-friendly interface. A new user doesn't have to be perturbed much to understand the functionality of this product. All the features are pretty understandable.

What do you dislike about Propellor?
nothing as such apart from CSV files that we need to download to export, but that's negligible

What problems is Propellor solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been tracking user events, and Propellor has proved an excellent ally for that. Its easy-to-use features have made it stand out from other products in the market. It wasn't any arduous for me, and I would suggest people looking for an excellent analytic tool to try this one.
